solution_line_template: He saw {num_cars} cars and {num_pickup_trucks} trucks so {num_cars}+{num_pickup_trucks} = <<{num_cars}+{num_pickup_trucks}={total_cars_trucks}>>{total_cars_trucks} vehicles

Those {total_cars_trucks} vehicles have {wheels_per_car_truck} wheels each so {total_cars_trucks}*{wheels_per_car_truck} = <<{total_cars_trucks}*{wheels_per_car_truck}={wheels_from_cars_trucks}>>{wheels_from_cars_trucks} wheels

Bicycles have {wheels_per_bicycle} wheels each and he saw {num_bicycles} bikes so {wheels_per_bicycle}*{num_bicycles} = <<{wheels_per_bicycle}*{num_bicycles}={wheels_from_bicycles}>>{wheels_from_bicycles} wheels

Tricycles have {wheels_per_tricycle} wheels each and he saw {num_tricycles} tricycle so {num_tricycles}*{wheels_per_tricycle} = <<{num_tricycles}*{wheels_per_tricycle}={wheels_from_tricycles}>>{wheels_from_tricycles} wheels
